line.originaltext: 6 eggs, beaten
2 1/4 cups milk
1/3 cup white sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 cup heavy whipping cream
2 teaspoons white sugar
1 pinch ground nutmeg
In a large saucepan, combine the eggs, milk and 1/3 cup sugar.
